title: Arclight/Justicar Mordekaiser
body:
A skin concept that has been discussed and suggested a lot in the past, also a way to give a new.. light.. to a loved champion :)

Works are not mine

http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/363/3/8/lol_arts__dark_crusader_mordekaiser_rework_by_mad_project-d5pl901.jpg

replies.body: I'm waiting for his VU/potential rework before I talk about Morde skins.

> I'm waiting for his VU/potential rework before I talk about Morde skins.

They could just do a skin with the actual Visual level (which I don't like much since it's turning metal into wood) and the upgrade all the skins. Pentakill already has upgraded visuals.

The bottom one is actually Riot's original concept for a sort of "Dark Paladin" Mordekaiser, but it got scrapped and turned into Lord Mordekaiser. I kind of like the idea of a "Good guy Mordekaiser" skin.

Thanks for your inputs.

I tried to look for some pre-made concepts about it and my suggestion isn't bound to these kinds of arts (even if I find both cool, expecially the second one :3). Any other Image/draw is welcome :D
Space marine Terminator much :P i like it!  For the Emperor! garen got a Space marine skin why morde couldnt. But the Lord morde already makes kind of a Chaos Space marine skin

That second picture really says "Paladin of Pain" all over it. 

Sound Familiar? 

If you read the foreshadowing {{champion:429}} , then there's your answer. 

Personally, I think it's time for {{champion:82}}  to get a good VU and Kit update.

The mobility the recent and older champs have leave him with little "STRATEGIC DIVERSITY".
Kinda look like Viscero Xin Zhao at first sight , but at least you tried. :p
